about.title: About BK Green
about.p1: BK GREEN TECHNICAL JOINT STOCK COMPANY is a young and dynamic company specializing in water supply, drainage construction and wastewater treatment projects.
about.p2: With a young, enthusiastic and highly skilled team of engineers, we bring real value to customers through modern technology and dedicated service.
